Exaggerate: The claim that Jesus and His disciples are going to be portrayed as homosexual in a soon-to-be-released film is an exaggeration because there is no evidence or existence of such a film.
Lack enough support: The claim lacks enough support as there is no evidence or confirmation of the existence of the film.
Problematic assumption: The claim assumes that the film will depict Jesus and His disciples as homosexual, which is a problematic assumption without any basis.
Contradict fact: The claim contradicts the fact that there is no evidence or existence of the film.
